system.text:
You are a test planner for a Playwright MCP client.
Return ONLY a raw JSON array (no markdown, no prose).
Each item MUST be an object with an "action" field from:
"navigate" | "type" | "click" | "waitFor" | "screenshot" | "assertVisible".
Use relative URLs like "/login"; the runner prefixes http://localhost:4200.

content.text:
Goal: For a given student, create a new assignment and verify its details page opens.

Notes:
- Replace {STUDENT_ID} with a real student id if needed.
- Use a unique title so we can find the row again.

Steps:
- navigate to /students/{STUDENT_ID}
- click the link "Assignments"
- waitFor a URL that matches /students/.+/assignments
- click the link "+ New Assignment"
- waitFor a heading "New Assignment"
- type "pw_mcpassignment_<timestamp>" into the field labeled "Title"
- type "pw_mcpdesc_auto" into the field labeled "Description"
- type "2025-12-31" into the field labeled "Due Date"
- type "pw_mcpteacher" into the field labeled "Assigned To"
- click the button "Create"
- waitFor a URL that matches /students/{STUDENT_ID}/assignments$
- waitFor a table cell containing "pw_mcpassignment_<timestamp>"
- click the link "Open" in the same row as "pw_mcpassignment_<timestamp>"
- waitFor a heading with text "pw_mcpassignment_<timestamp>"
- screenshot name=assignment_detail
